        public Hitbox(java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage> img,
              int x,
              int y,
              int w,
              int h,
              int dam,
              int dur,
              int kx,
              int ky)
        Parameters:
        img - arraylist of images to be used, only uses 1
        x - top left x
        y - top left y
        w - width
        h - height
        dam - damage
        dur - duration of the hitbox in frames
        kx - x knockback
        ky - y knockback
